name: Grimlock
senses: keensense 30 ft. (can't sense beyond this radius)

actions.name: Spiked Club
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d4+3) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The grimlock's Perception is 16 when perceiving by hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Stone Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The grimlock's Stealth is 18 while in rocky terrain.

special_abilities.name: Suppressed Senses
special_abilities.desc: The grimlock can't use its keensense while deafened and unable to smell.
